about_the_game: The "Guilty Me" game development and production story pack gives players a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game, with exclusive interviews, documentaries and materials. Discover the challenges faced by the development team, the inspirations behind the story and design, and immerse yourself in the magic of gaming through this enriching package.
detailed_description: The "Guilty Me" game development and production story pack gives players a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game, with exclusive interviews, documentaries and materials. Discover the challenges faced by the development team, the inspirations behind the story and design, and immerse yourself in the magic of gaming through this enriching package.
name: Guilty Me - History development
short_description: The "Guilty Me" game development and production story pack gives players a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the game, with exclusive interviews, documentaries and materials. Discover the challenges faced by the development team.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
